```{R setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)

# Reading in data
housing <- read.csv("pierce_co_house_sales.csv")

# Convert sale_date to Date type
housing$sale_date <- as.Date(housing$sale_date)

```


```{R}

head(housing)

```


```{R}
# Number of rooms and sales price

rooms_price <- subset(housing, select = c("bedrooms", "sale_price"))

boxplot((sale_price/1000000) ~ bedrooms, data = rooms_price, xlab = "Number of bedrooms", ylab = "Sale Price (in millions)")

```



```{R}
# Square Feet and Sales Price

square_ft_price <- subset(housing, select = c("house_square_feet", "sale_price"))

#par(mfrow=c(1,3))

plot(housing$house_square_feet, (housing$sale_price / 1000000), xlab = "Square Feet", ylab = "Sales Price (in millions)")

#plot(housing$house_square_feet, log(housing$sale_price), xlab = "Square Feet", ylab = "Log Sales Price")

boxplot(house_square_feet ~ sale_price, data = housing)

```
